description:
In the Fair Lawn, New Jersey, area, if you have suffered a serious injury, turn to the experienced personal injury lawyers of Sakkas, Cahn & Weiss, LLP. The attorneys of our law firm have more than 60 years of combined experience. During those years of serving our clients' needs, we have secured nearly $500 million in compensation.

We know the impact that serious personal injuries can have on people's lives. In an instant, your life can be turned upside down. A family breadwinner may be unable to work. The parent children depend on may be unable to take care of daily responsibilities. The financial difficulties that can be created by mounting medical bills and lost wages can cause anxiety and stress for even the most financially stable household.

The successful pursuit of compensation for your injuries is a complicated process that requires experienced guidance and a strong advocate. Recovering the compensation you need calls for the help of a personal injury attorney who understands how to build the most persuasive case from even the most challenging of circumstances.

We are committed to providing our clients with the exceptional representation they need. To schedule a free initial consultation with one of the Fair Lawn personal injury attorneys of Sakkas, Cahn & Weiss, LLP, call 212-571-7171.
